description: Amendments to planning permission dated 12 August 2020 (RN: 20/03254/LBC) for alterations to rear lower ground floor windows.  Excavation of vault, and alterations to vault doors in association with the conversion of vaults to use as part of basement flat, internal alterations, replacement of existing front door and alterations to existing windows. Site includes 39 Randolph Avenue. Internal alterations, NAMELY, lowering of door and window thresholds at rear of property, front courtyard lowered and one additional step to exterior stair, non-original partition wall in study removed and new partition wall installed, vault windows lowered and reduced in size, access hatches to hallway ceiling storage relocated, front door side panel design updated.
